channel.title: I need vb help again lol
channel.description:
[img]http://img239.imageshack.us/img239/3584/inedhlpya2.png[/img]
ok what i need done is when somebody clicks the 'foul' button i need like some text of an image to appear.
thanks.

item.title: I need vb help again lol
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

it should look some thing like this

[code]Private Sub Form_Load()

Label1.Visible = False
Label2.Visible = False
Label3.Visible = False

End Sub

Private Sub command1_Click()

If Label1.Visible = False Then
Label1.Visible = True
ElseIf Label1.Visible = True And Label2.Visible = False Then
Label2.Visible = True
ElseIf Label1.Visible = True And Label2.Visible = True Then
Label3.Visible = True
End If

End Sub[/code]

command1 being the foul button
label1 being the first foul box
label2 being the second foul box
label3 being the third foul box

Read full topic
